resources.string: Update your daily water content below:
How much water have you had since you last recorded an entry?
(Please enter an integer for the number of full glasses)
Tip #1: Drinking a pint of water in one go is not easy. Our advice is to sip at your glass! You could use a straw to help with this.
Tip #2: Pace yourself through the day. Use a water bottle to mark where you want to be at what time.
Tip #3: If you\'re bored, a little sugar won\'t hurt you! Have a small, flavoured glass of water during the day to break things up.
Tip #4: Don\'t forget to eat. It\'s all well and good drinking lot\'s of water, but don\'t do it in replacement of meals!
Tip #5: You could always imagine you\'re just sipping a Pina Colada. Unless, of course, that makes you crave one too badly that you\'ll actually go get one...
